sentences.english: Her barrister, Mr Doane, pleaded that she was of weak intellect.
sentences.chinese: 多恩律师辩护她为神智不清。

sentences.english: Eyes rolled back as she wavered for several seconds before regaining consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 她颤抖了几秒，双目才恢复了神智。

sentences.english: But the fourth managed to keep his sanity".
sentences.chinese: 但第四个弟子却始终神智清醒。

sentences.english: I was conscious but I couldn't speak.
sentences.chinese: 当时我神智是清楚的，但我不能讲话。

sentences.english: These fields of energy are called "bodies" or "vehicles" in the theosophical literature.
sentences.chinese: 这些能量场在神智学作品中称作“躯体”或“载体”。

sentences.english: Nobody will come to a pub where they'll get scared out of their wits .
sentences.chinese: 没人会到这个把他们吓得神智不清的酒馆里来。

sentences.english: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 本活动保留驱离酗酒与神智不清者之权利。

sentences.english: I made sure my colleague was insane.
sentences.chinese: 我完全相信我的同行是神智不清了。

sentences.english: DESPERATE】She became so desperate that we feared for her sanity.
sentences.chinese: 她变得如此自暴自弃，使我们担心她的神智。

sentences.english: The sudden arrest of his motion, the abrasion of one of his hands on the gravel, restored him, and he wept with delight.
sentences.chinese: 地面的砂砾擦伤了他的一只手，这让他恢复了神智。

sentences.english: Theosophy is one branch of occult ism.
sentences.chinese: 神智学是神秘学的一个分支。

sentences.english: That girl is so spaced - out that she is walking down the middle of the road completely nude.
sentences.chinese: 那个女孩神智不清，竟然不穿衣服走在马路中央。

sentences.english: One man's mental blackout ruined the last hope of two nations.
sentences.chinese: 一个人神智不清，两个国家的希望都被毁灭了。

sentences.english: They might not be thinking clearly.
The girl is so spaced-out that she is walking down the middle of the road completely nude.
sentences.chinese: 那个女子神智不清以至全身赤裸的在马路中央行走。

definition: mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
to be delirious/to be mentally confused
three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man
